DOC.detailed_description: HF major public health problem United States , affect approximately 5 million adult . Despite recent advance pharmacologic therapy technologic device , HF common reason hospitalization among Medicare patient reach epidemic proportion population age . New inexpensive intervention improve functional capacity quality life delay disease progression need . Tai chi popular mind-body exercise potential treatment heart disease . This exercise incorporate gentle physical activity meditation , may particularly suit frail patient HF . This study examine effect tailor tai chi program functional capacity quality life patient HF . Participants randomly assign either tai chi program heart health education 12 week . Participants group undergo bicycle stress test study entry receive weekly training session assign intervention . Self-report scale questionnaire use assess participant study start end 12 week .
